content.html: Holy Shit! I just found this amazing treasure trove of material for anyone interested in learning UX for VR. The best part? It's free! Credits to @omgmog for curating and building it uxofvr.com

Holy Shit! 

I just found this amazing treasure trove of material for anyone interested in learning UX for VR.

The best part? It's free!

Credits to @omgmog for curating and building it
uxofvr.com
